pli-tv-bu-vb-sk34:1.3.1: According to Sp 2.604 this means the bean curries should make up one quarter of the rice: _Samasūpako nāma yattha bhattassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo sūpo hoti_, “Wherever the bean curry is one quarter of the rice is called _samasūpaka_.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk34:1.14: According to Kkh this means any curries apart from bean curry: _Ṭhapetvā pana sūpaṁ avasesā sabbā pi sūpeyyabyañjanavikati rasaraso nāma hoti_, “But apart from bean curry, all kinds of curry are called _rasarasa_.” My translation, however, is based on the fact that all other foods too are excluded.
